column1: This table was created by hand to assign a fertilizer type to a category for IPCC volatilization calc
Possible categories include urea, ammonium, nitrate, ammonium-nitrate, and organic
For UAN which is both urea and ammonium nitrate, I have no idea what to do.
uan-32 is 32% nitrogen (25% nitrate, 25% ammonium nitrogen, 50% urea), so assign it as urea
